name: matrix
desc: Simulasi 'Digital Rain' ala Matrix. (Ctrl+C untuk stop)
author: Termz
command:
import random
import time

chars = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789@#$%^&*()[]'
print('Memasuki Matrix... (Ctrl+C untuk keluar)')
time.sleep(1)
try:
    while True:
        line = ''.join(random.choice(chars + ' ' * 10) for _ in range(70))
        print(f'\033[1;32m{line}\033[0m')
        time.sleep(0.05)
except KeyboardInterrupt:
    print('
Keluar dari Matrix.')
